description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Assume command of the Guard or Hegemony forces in a variety of customizable scenarios featuring casual turn-based strategy and real-time one-on-one combat.  Version 1.1 includes balancing, gameplay, and minor graphic improvements as well as a tutorial and three additional scenarios.
description.short: Assume command of the Guard or Hegemony forces in a variety of customizable scenarios featuring casual turn-based strategy and real-time one-on-one combat.
